forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and thunder. Low 8C.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with a few rumbles of thunder. Lows overnight in the upper 40s.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers this evening, then cloudy with rain likely overnight. Low 8C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers early, then overcast overnight with occasional rain. Low 47F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain showers. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers along with windy conditions. High 51F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 51F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
